backend/main.mo: Defines shipment, invoice, client, payment, account, and session types with in-memory maps and rate‑limit logic for authentication and OTP handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing through the adminPassword field unchanged.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend source files and components.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing the Google Maps API key.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining design tokens and light/dark theme color variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the Vite React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling home page UI, tracking form, authentication transitions, and lazy‑loaded dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin view showing a client's info with tabs for their shipments and invoices.
Form component for adding or updating a client's profile, handling validation and mutation submission.
Dialog for creating and provisioning a client account, including password generation and principal validation.
Displays a searchable table of client accounts with options to refresh, repair unlinked clients, and select a client.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard with tabs for clients, tracking, revenue, history, and configuration, plus global actions like provisioning and logout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel to view and configure the Google Geocoding API key with status checks and submission form.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that triggers CSV export of all invoices using a mutation and downloads the file.
Provides an admin interface to list, create, update, and delete client invoices with status handling and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Displays client login history with loading, error, and empty states using a table layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Allows admins to store and verify the MSG91 API key, showing status indicators and providing input controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Fetches and visualizes revenue data in a line chart with handling for loading, errors, and empty datasets.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Shows a static notice explaining that role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Manages client shipments with listing, creation, and deletion features, including optional coordinate handling and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin panel that conditionally loads Google Maps and displays shipment markers with error handling and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches app errors and shows a styled error UI with refresh and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message when a user lacks required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap UI showing that Internet Identity-based setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form with error handling and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button for admin users that logs out and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog with form fields but no real submission logic.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard with logout, support link, and tabs for shipments and invoices.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays client invoices with status badges, login checks, error states, and invoice actions like download or pay.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: UI card for clients to change their temporary password with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Renders login/signup tabs and switches to login after successful signup.
Login card supporting password and OTP authentication with validation and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays client shipments with loading, error, authentication, and linkage error handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Signup form for clients with identifier normalization, password validation, and signup mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Provides client session token context with helpers to set/clear tokens and track authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hooks for checking and triggering admin bootstrap actions using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, including validation, login, storage, and error handling using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for client signup, login, OTP flow, and data fetching, integrating with backend actor methods and session handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and DFC gold color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable invoice PDF by rendering styled HTML in a new window and triggering the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local client, profile, and login history types and re-exports backend types for shared use.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp deep links for invoice reminders and support messages, formatting phone numbers and encoding message text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps various error shapes to short, user-friendly authentication error messages.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers and returns structured validation results.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Converts React Query errors into clean user-facing messages, using auth error mappings when relevant.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a DOM element offset by a fixed header height.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and notes issues regarding admin password update and persistence.
